main.name: Benson Madueke
main.bio: I'm a Frontend developer experienced at building web and mobile solutions with JavaScript, CSS, React and HTML. I'm a smart and creative professional, passionate about developing Tech solutions for the next billion users. I believe in excellence, teamwork, and collaboration. The sum of my development and problem-solving experience has been around building user-first, performant, and accessible web solutions in the real-estate, e-commerce, and fin-tech industries. My main tech stack is MERN but I also do PERN. I obtained my National Diploma in Computer Science from the Institute of Management and Technology, Enugu, Nigeria.

education.school: Institute of Management and Technology, Enugu
education.description: Obtained A NAtional Diploma In Computer Science. Graduated with a GPA of 2.9.
